error_message: Failed to deliver webhook to https://mystore.com/webhooks after 3 retries. Connection timeout.
resolution_steps: Verify endpoint is publicly accessible
Check SSL certificate validity
Ensure endpoint responds within 30 seconds

error_message: 429 Too Many Requests. Rate limit of 100 requests per minute exceeded.
possible_causes: Multiple integrations using same API key
resolution_steps: Implement exponential backoff with jitter
Use bulk endpoints for batch operations
Spread requests across time window
Contact support for rate limit increase

error_message: Invalid API key provided for payment gateway. Authentication failed.
resolution_steps: Regenerate API keys from payment gateway dashboard
Verify using production keys (not test/sandbox)
Ensure payment gateway app is re-installed post-migration
Check webhook secret is also updated

error_message: Currency display mismatch. Store currency: EUR, Display currency: USD
resolution_steps: Clear storefront cache
Verify currency settings in Dashboard > Settings > General
Check theme files for hardcoded currency symbols
Review multi-currency settings if enabled

error_message: Product sync failed. Media assets not found in expected location.
symptoms: Media upload returns success but not visible
resolution_steps: Wait 30 minutes for CDN propagation
Verify images are under 20MB and in supported format
Use media API to check upload status
Re-upload failed images individually

error_message: Access token expired. Token lifetime: 3600 seconds.
possible_causes: Refresh token not being used correctly
Token expiry time change in new API version
resolution_steps: Implement proper refresh token flow
Store refresh token securely
Handle token refresh before expiry (5 min buffer)
Re-authenticate if refresh token expired

error_message: Inventory count discrepancy detected. Expected: 150, Actual: 145
resolution_steps: Export current inventory to review discrepancies
Use inventory adjustments API for corrections
Implement inventory versioning/locking
Enable inventory history for audit trail

error_message: Discount code SAVE20 not applicable. Minimum order value not met.
resolution_steps: Review discount rules in Dashboard > Discounts
Check 'Applies to' restrictions
Verify usage count hasn't exceeded limit
Confirm start/end dates are current

error_message: 403 Forbidden. API key lacks required scope: products:write
possible_causes: API key scopes not updated post-migration
New API version requires additional scopes
resolution_steps: Review required scopes in API documentation
Regenerate key with all necessary scopes
Check app permissions in store settings
Verify API version compatibility

error_message: Tax calculation failed. Conflicting tax settings: inclusive and exclusive
possible_causes: Price migration didn't preserve tax settings
resolution_steps: Review Settings > Taxes > Tax calculation
Choose either tax-inclusive OR exclusive, not both
Configure per-region tax rules if needed
Test with sample orders before going live

error_message: Subscription renewal failed for customer ID: CUST-12345. Payment method declined.
possible_causes: Webhook for payment events not configured
resolution_steps: Verify billing integration is connected
Check payment webhook endpoints are active
Review failed payment attempts in gateway dashboard
Notify affected customers to update payment method

error_message: Shipping rate not found for destination: DE, Method: International Priority
resolution_steps: Review shipping zones in Settings > Shipping
Verify country assignments to zones
Test rates with different destination countries
Check carrier API configuration

error_message: Customer login failed. Password hash algorithm mismatch.
possible_causes: Password hashing algorithm different in new platform
resolution_steps: Trigger bulk password reset for migrated customers
Verify email sending configuration
Check customer import logs for errors
Send migration communication to customers

error_message: Product search index outdated. Last update: 72 hours ago.
possible_causes: Search index not rebuilt after migration
Product catalog too large for auto-index
Event triggers for indexing not set up
resolution_steps: Trigger manual search index rebuild
Check indexing job status in admin panel
Enable incremental indexing for large catalogs
Verify product event webhooks for index updates

error_message: Bulk operation timed out after 300 seconds. Processed 450 of 1000 items.
possible_causes: File too large for single operation
resolution_steps: Break large files into smaller batches (500 items max)
Run bulk operations during off-peak hours
Use async bulk operation endpoints
Monitor operation status via job ID
